member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.ExternalContentDataAttribute
member.summary: Base class for any xUnit data attribute that reads data from an external source such as a file or embedded resource.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.ExternalContentDataAttribute.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the character encoding to use when loading the resource data.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.ExternalContentDataAttribute.DetectEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically detect the character encoding when loading the resource data.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.ResourceDataAttribute
member.summary: Base class for xUnit data attributes that extract data from one or more embedded resources in assemblies.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.ResourceDataAttribute.Assembly
member.summary: The assembly to load the resources from. If not specified, this defaults to the currently executing assembly.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors.FileNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to File {0} not found..

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors.FilesNotSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify at least one valid file name..

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors.MismatchDataVsParams
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The number of parameters on the test method ({0}) does not match the number of data items returned by the data attribute ({1}).

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors.NullOrEmptyResource
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Resource names cannot be null or empty..

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Errors.ResourcesNotSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify at least one valid resource name..

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.FileAsJsonAttribute
member.summary: Provides a data source for a data theory, with the data coming from one or more files, where each resource is a JSON structure that can be deserialized into the specified type.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.ResourceAsJsonAttribute
member.summary: Provides a data source for a data theory, with the data coming from one or more assembly embedded contents, where each resource is a JSON structure that can be deserialized into the specified type.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.ResourceContentAttribute
member.summary: Provides a data source for a data theory, with the data coming as the content of one or more assembly embedded contents.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.ResourceLinesAttribute
member.summary: Provides a data source for a data theory, with the data coming from one or more assembly embedded contents, where each data item is a single line in the embedded resource content.
